damageCoefficient.description: Damage is calculated by the formula damageCoefficient * (1/2)(ship mass)(velocity)^2, where velocity is how much the entity was moved as a result of being hit.

entityVelocityThreshold.description: If the entity's velocity contributes less than this percentage towards a collision velocity, damage is calculated.

fastShip.description: The speed over which death messages will consider the ship fast (in m^2/t^2)

heavyMass.description: The mass over which death messages will consider the ship heavy

knockbackCoefficient.description: Knockback is calculated by the formula knockbackCoefficient * (1/2)(ship mass)(velocity)^2, where velocity is how much the player was moved as a result of being hit.

massThreshold.description: The minimum mass of a ship for which this mod's effects should apply

maxDamage.description: Maximum damage that can be inflicted by a ship.

maxKnockback.description: Maximum knockback allowed. Number is roughly equivalent to knockback enchantment.

minDamage.description: Minimum damage that can be inflicted by a ship.

minKnockback.description: Minimum knockback allowed. Number is roughly equivalent to knockback enchantment.

speedThreshold.description: The minimum collision velocity, measured in (blocks / tick)^2, when this mod's effects should apply. The collision velocity is how much the player was moved as a result of being hit.
